sentences.en: Although it's not strenuous exercise, you feel toned-up, supple and relaxed.
sentences.cn: 虽然这不是剧烈运动，但会让人感到强健、柔韧与放松。

sentences.en: Get your body moving to boost energy, stay supple and shake off winter lethargy.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体以增加活力，保持柔韧性，甩掉冬日的慵懒。

sentences.en: He admired the graceful, supple movements of the dancers.
sentences.cn: 他赞扬了舞蹈演员优雅灵巧的舞姿.

sentences.en: He held Julia's supple waist easily encircled by his arm.
sentences.cn: 他把裘莉亚的柔软的细腰很轻易地搂在胳膊里.

sentences.en: Her skin had stayed soft and supple.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤一直柔滑而有弹性.

sentences.en: Paul was incredibly supple and strong.
sentences.cn: 保罗身体极其灵活，而且非常结实。

sentences.en: Regular use of a body lotion will keep the skin soft and supple.
sentences.cn: 经常使用润肤露可使皮肤柔软而富有弹性。

sentences.en: She exercises every day to keep herself supple.
sentences.cn: 她每天锻炼以保持身体柔韧。

sentences.en: She gets along well with people because of her supple nature.
sentences.cn: 她与大家相处很好,因为她的天性柔和.

sentences.en: The leather is supple and sturdy enough to last for years.
sentences.cn: 该皮革柔软而结实，足以用上数年。

sentences.en: The wine has a medium-bodied, supple flavour.
sentences.cn: 该葡萄酒味道不浓不淡，口感醇滑。

sentences.en: They are the only ones whose brains are supple enough for the mental gymnastics required.
sentences.cn: 他们是仅有的那些头脑足够灵活来应对这些需要动脑筋的事的人。

sentences.en: This mask leaves your complexion feeling soft and supple.
sentences.cn: 这种面膜能使你的皮肤变得柔软细嫩。

sentences.en: Traditional cheesemaking skills give our brie its soft, supple, creamy texture.
sentences.cn: 用传统干酪制作技术制成的布里干酪柔软，不易裂开，而且口感细滑。

sentences.en: Try these simple exercises to keep your feet supple.
sentences.cn: 尝试做这些简单的锻炼来保持双脚的柔韧性。

trans.tran_cn: （身体）柔软的，灵活的，易弯曲的，顺从的，巴结的
trans.tran_en: someone who is supple bends and moves easily and gracefully
